nodes.text: Balmgrass was a type of soft grass found on the Core World planet Chandrila in the vicinity of Landing Platform OB-99. In springtime, the color of balmgrass changed from red to green.

Balmgrass first appeared in the new Star Wars canon in Aftermath: Life Debt, a 2016 novel written by Chuck Wendig. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, balmgrass was introduced in Greg Keyes's 2001 novel The New Jedi Order: Edge of Victory II: Rebirth, the eighth volume of the Star Wars: The New Jedi Order series.
